text: Aleksandar Stefanov Shalamanov () (4 September 1941â€“ 25 October 2021) was a football player and professional alpine skier. He took part in the 1960 Winter Olympics. He played for the Bulgaria national football team, making 42 appearances between 1964 until 1971. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Skiers Category:Olympians for Bulgaria
title: Aleksandar Shalamanov
